name: Very Very Plane
description:
It uses standard keyboard controls and is gamepad compatible.

Left - a or <- key 

Right - d or -> key

In this game, you fly a beautifully crafted plane and dodge birds, mountains, and etc. That's pretty much it. Just your standard infinite runner kind of game.

It is compatible with the gamepad's left analog stick, but you'll have to click with the mouse on the buttons if need to navigate through the menus. This wasn't intended to work for the browser. This was originally mobile game, so some things might be weird.

This is the first completed game I've ever made. Well, my first game is actually Very Plane (got removed for not having a privacy policy) , but it was fairly...plane and didn't have much to it, so this is a redone, reworked and remastered version of it. This was finished in the beginning  2017, so I won't be adding stuff to it because I don't really want to work on it anymore. If I figure out some database things, I might make a leaderboard for the browser version.

Here's the mobile version for Android : Very Very Plane. That one has accomplishments and a leaderboard if you're into that stuff. It is also free and will never contain ads or in-app purchases! It works on really old phones like the Samsung S4 because that's what it was made for. 

Game Programming, Music, 3D models were constructed by me.

Have fun and thanks for playing!
